sectionText: Topic:  The Human Experience: Language, Identity, Memory & Diaspora.  This interdisciplinary course approaches the study of global cultures through literature-in-translation and film. Organized thematically into four units, Language, Identity, Memory and Diaspora, the format of the course is creative and participatory. Chronologically the course reaches from the archaic origins of language into the present day; geographically the course traverses the globe. This course also meets with SLCL 200 A.
